001package gust.backend.driver.inmemory;
002
003import com.google.common.cache.Cache;
004import com.google.common.cache.CacheBuilder;
005import com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListeningScheduledExecutorService;
006import com.google.protobuf.Message;
007import gust.backend.model.*;
008import gust.backend.runtime.ReactiveFuture;
009
010import javax.annotation.Nonnull;
011import javax.annotation.concurrent.ThreadSafe;
012import java.time.Duration;
013import java.util.Optional;
014
015
016/**
017 * Defines a {@link CacheDriver} backed by a Guava in-memory cache, which statically holds onto cached full model
018 * instances, potentially on behalf of some other persistence driver (via use with a {@link ModelAdapter}).
019 *
020 * <p>Cache options may be adjusted based on the operation being memoized, using the {@link CacheOptions} interface,
021 * which is supported by various other higher-order options interfaces (i.e. {@link FetchOptions}).</p>
022 *
023 * @param <K> Type of key used with the cache and model.
024 * @param <M> Type of model supported by this cache facade.
025 */
026@ThreadSafe
027@SuppressWarnings("UnstableApiUsage")
028public final class InMemoryCache<K extends Message, M extends Message> implements CacheDriver<K, M> {
029  /** Static in-memory instance cache. */
030  private final static @Nonnull InMemoryCaching CACHE = new InMemoryCaching();
031
032  /** Responsible for managing static cache access. */
033  private final static class InMemoryCaching {
034    /** Internal backing cache storage. */
035    private final @Nonnull Cache<String, Message> inMemoryCache;
036
037    /** Initialize in-memory caching from scratch. */
038    private InMemoryCaching() {
039      inMemoryCache = CacheBuilder.newBuilder()
040        .concurrencyLevel(2)
041        .maximumSize(50)
042        .expireAfterWrite(Duration.ofHours(1))
043        .weakKeys()
044        .recordStats()
045        .build();
046    }
047
048    /**
049     * Acquire the in-memory static cache, which holds onto model instances without requiring serialization. In-memory
050     * caching may be used transparently with any backing {@link PersistenceDriver}.
051     *
052     * @return In-memory static model cache.
053     */
054    @Nonnull Cache<String, Message> acquire() {
055      return inMemoryCache;
056    }
057  }
058
059  /**
060   * Acquire an instance of the in-memory caching driver, generalized to support the provided key type {@code K} and
061   * model instance type {@code M}.
062   *
063   * @param <K> Generic type for the key associated with model type {@code M}.
064   * @param <M> Generic model type managed by this cache.
065   * @return Instance of the acquired cache engine.
066   */
067  static @Nonnull <K extends Message, M extends Message> InMemoryCache<K, M> acquire() {
068    return new InMemoryCache<>();
069  }
070
071  /** {@inheritDoc} */
072  @Override
073  public @Nonnull ReactiveFuture injectRecord(@Nonnull Message key,
074                                              @Nonnull Message model,
075                                              @Nonnull ListeningScheduledExecutorService executor) {
076    return ReactiveFuture.wrap(executor.submit(() -> {
077      String id = (
078        ModelMetadata.<String>id(key).orElseThrow(() -> new IllegalArgumentException("Cannot inject with empty key.")));
079      CACHE.acquire().put(id, model);
080    }), executor);
081  }
082
083  /** {@inheritDoc} */
084  @Override
085  public @Nonnull ReactiveFuture<Optional<M>> fetchCached(@Nonnull K key,
086                                                          @Nonnull FetchOptions options,
087                                                          @Nonnull ListeningScheduledExecutorService executor) {
088    return ReactiveFuture.wrap(options.executorService().orElse(executor).submit(() -> {
089      String id = (
090        ModelMetadata.<String>id(key).orElseThrow(() -> new IllegalArgumentException("Cannot fetch empty key.")));
091      Message cached = (CACHE.acquire().getIfPresent(id));
092
093      //noinspection unchecked
094      return cached == null ? Optional.empty() : Optional.of((M)cached);
095    }), executor);
096  }
097}
